content: please note this is the chart and description for the pattern only and not a full instruction for knitting socks beginners may look for a full instruction pattern instead in my version the sock has been knitted with 64 cast on stitches on needle 3 0mm us size 2 5 for a european size 39/40 info for making pattern adjustments less or more stitches is given cuff heel and tip can be knitted in every way you want the pattern is knitted over 16 stitches and over 16 row half pattern 8 row pattern is for every 4-ply sock yarn fingering needle range us 1 5-2 5 2 5-3 0 mm
